name: Shoot-em-up (robertarotaritei)
description:
Shoot-em-up is a 2D game made in Unity. The player controls a spaceship that flies through space. Other spaceships will try to attack the player, who will have to destroy them.

How to play:

Arrow Keys - Move
Mouse Click - Shoot
Escape - Pause Game
M - Mute Sound

The game has:
- 3 enemy types
- achievements
- player skins
- high-score tracking
- 2 power-ups
- sound
- menu screen
- options menu
- pause menu
